column5: The telecommunications industry has revolutionised the way we live today, utilising technology in different application areas including medical, agriculture and logistics. It is one of the world's most rapidly developing industries and this course has been designed to meet the growing demand for skilled graduates.
column7: UK students Full-time students: £10,500 Part-time students: £70 per credit Part-time students: £35 per dissertation credit  EU/International Full-time students: £15,700 Part-time students: £101 per credit Part-time students: £50 per dissertation credit
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
